fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Files: Learn 3 roles. At least 2 of them will be in the game. [AOR2]
- Sixth Sense: The first time you trade, learn if the other player truly wins with the King.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Detect: Pick 3 non-King players. Learn if the majority of them win with the King or not. [2 uses, 3 CD, UOR2]
- Trace: Pick a card and a player. Learn if that card was played by the player you chose. [2 uses, 2 CD]
